translation.Message_0_Page_0: If you're looking for food, <color=rare>Flora</color> over there in the kitchen area - she'll sell you some food. If you're hurt or sick, <color=epic>Maria</color> can heal you up, given you have proper payment.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: If you move up our ranks, <color=legendary>Snow</color> can sell you uniforms. And if you're looking for weaponry - <color=epic>Cynthia</color> can sell you that, but you gotta prove yourself.
